definition: unswerving in one's loyalty (idiom); faithful and constant

sentences.english: No, let me be obsequious in thy heart.
sentences.chinese: 不，请让我在你心里长保忠贞。

sentences.english: She did not remain anything like faithful to him.
sentences.chinese: 她后来对他就根本谈不上什么忠贞不渝了。

sentences.english: They asked me how I knew my true love was true.
sentences.chinese: 他们问我怎么知道我的挚爱对我永远忠贞不二的。

sentences.english: Mary was sure of John's single-mindedness.
sentences.chinese: 玛丽对约翰的忠贞很有把握。

sentences.english: The local Bai ethnic group regard the spring a symbol of eternal and faithful love.
sentences.chinese: 白族人心中的蝴蝶泉是忠贞爱情的象征。

sentences.english: Her husband was charged with fraud but she stuck by him.
sentences.chinese: 她丈夫被指控犯有诈骗罪，但她仍旧对他忠贞不渝。

sentences.english: He often inculcates in young people the duty of loyalty.
sentences.chinese: 他经常以忠贞之道谆谆教诲年轻人。

sentences.english: He serves me most, who serves his country best – Homer.
sentences.chinese: 他对我矢志不渝，而我对国家忠贞不二。

sentences.english: Of that true type hath Tarquin rifled me.
sentences.chinese: 塔昆已经劫夺了我的忠贞的标志。

sentences.english: She's always faithful to her husband.
sentences.chinese: 她对丈夫始终忠贞不渝。

sentences.english: The Egyptians will be tested again as to their fidelity to democratic ways.
sentences.chinese: 埃及人对民主的忠贞将再次接受考验。

sentences.english: All the men that are constantly drooling.
sentences.chinese: 所有的男人都是忠贞不渝。

sentences.english: I see. And I'll always be devoted to you.
sentences.chinese: 我明白，我将对你忠贞不渝。

sentences.english: Her pledge to remain faithful to him was his anchor when he was in prison.
sentences.chinese: 她对他忠贞不渝的保证是他服刑时代的精神支柱。

sentences.english: B eing tested for HIV and being faithful in marriage and monogamous relationships
sentences.chinese: 检测艾滋病病毒，忠贞于婚姻，实行一夫一妻制。

sentences.english: He liked their toughness and their loyalty .
sentences.chinese: 他喜欢他们的坚韧不拔和忠贞不二。

definition: unswerving in one's loyalty (idiom); faithful and constant
faithful unto death (i.e. Confucian ban on widow remarrying)
ready to die to preserve one's chastity
faithful (to the memory of betrothed)/constant (of widow who remains unmarried)
